TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormViewDeleteEventHandler(object sender, FormViewDeleteEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormViewDeleteEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormViewDeleteEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormViewDeleteEventArgs)
public delegate void FormViewDeleteEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormViewDeleteEventArgs ^ e);
type FormViewDeleteEventHandler = delegate of obj * FormViewDeleteEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Um que contém os dados do evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipula o evento de um controle .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O controlar gera a evento quando um botão Excluir (um botão com sua `CommandName` propriedade definida como "Excluir") dentro do controle é clicado, mas antes o controle exclui o registro.The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada, como verificar um registro antes de excluí-lo, sempre que esse evento ocorre.This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. Quando você cria um delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado ao evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratando e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar programaticamente uma delegar para o eventos de um controle.The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeleteEventHandler2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandler2/CS/formviewdeleteeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeleteEventHandler2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandler2/VB/formviewdeleteeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar declarativamente uma delegar para o eventos de um controle.The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2/CS/formviewdeleteeventhandlerdeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventHandlerDeclarative2/VB/formviewdeleteeventhandlerdeclarativevb.aspx#1)]
